thread.title: Amy Childs flaunts her growing baby bump and ample boobs in skimpy floral bikini on holiday
thread.title_full: Amy Childs flaunts her growing baby bump and ample boobs in skimpy floral bikini on holiday

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Amy Childs flaunts her growing baby bump and ample boobs in skimpy floral bikini on holiday
text:
Amy Childs flaunts her growing baby bump and ample boobs in skimpy floral bikini on holiday The former TOWIE star is expecting her first child Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Amy Childs ' life is about to change in a BIG way. 
She's expecting her first child in early May – but there's still time to squeeze one last sun-soaked holiday in before she pops. 
The former TOWIE star jetted to Tel Aviv and was spotted walking along the beach. 
The 26 year old – who's expecting a baby girl – showed off her growing baby bump in a bright blue floral bikini. Amy Childs on the beach in Tel Aviv (Photo: MEGA) The mum-to-be went for a walk on the beach (Photo: MEGA) 
The halterneck-style top struggled to hold her ample boobs as she splashed around in the waves. 
The red-haired beauty covered up in a sheer white kaftan. 
She wore her flame-red hair in a glamorous blow dry. She inspected her growing baby bump (Photo: MEGA) Amy wore a bright blue floral bikini (Photo: MEGA) 
She went light with her makeup. 
She defined her arched eyebrows and wore a flick of mascara. 
Sweeping bronzer on her face she left her lips bare for a natural look. She wore natural makeup (Photo: MEGA) She is due to give birth in May (Photo: MEGA) 
Earlier this month, she revealed she's expecting a daughter with handsome boyfriend, Bradley Wright. 
"I think I'm still in shock. Instinct told me it would be a boy. A psychic told me it was going to be a boy and lots of people I knew thought the same," she told OK! Magazine . 
"I even ordered a boy Moncler baby bag because I was so convinced. But it's a girl!". 
Brentwood-born Amy was told the child's gender after thirteen weeks, but added that she was happy to have a tot of either gender - as long as they were healthy. 
"I don't mind as long as it's a healthy baby," she added. "I've wanted a baby for so long." Like us on Facebook
